feed.title: BORIS is an easy-to-use event logging software for video/audio coding and live observations.

entry.title: 2023-03-30: BORIS v.8.19.1 is available
entry.content: v.8.19.1 available. Some functions were added: scan-sampling from media files, stop ongoing state events between and at the end of media files and some bugs were fixed.
entry.summary: v.8.19.1 available. Some functions were added: scan-sampling from media files, stop ongoing state events between and at the end of media files and some bugs were fixed.

entry.title: 2023-03-30: BORIS v.8.16.3 is available
entry.content: v.8.16.3 available. A serious bug in v. 8.16.1 (for Windows) was fixed
entry.summary: v.8.16.3 available. A serious bug in v. 8.16.1 (for Windows) was fixed

entry.title: 2023-03-20: BORIS v.8.14 is available
entry.content: v.8.14 available. Added geometric measurements for observations from pictures
entry.summary: v.8.14 available. Added geometric measurements for observations from pictures

entry.title: 2023-03-16: BORIS v.8.13 is available
entry.content: v.8.13 available. Video real-time rotation and behavior color added, some bugs fixed
entry.summary: v.8.13 available. Video real-time rotation and behavior color added, some bugs fixed
